stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Payday Loan Laws in Texas
stateCompliance.content: Irving residents should understand that payday loans are legal in Texas through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs). While Texas has minimal state-level restrictions, you are protected by state regulations administered by the Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC).
keyPoints: Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs) regulated by the OCCC
There is no state cap on interest rates or CAB fees - typical APRs range from 400% to 700%+
You have the right to cancel your loan within 3 days of signing without penalty
Lenders cannot threaten criminal prosecution for non-payment (except for fraud or theft)
Your wages cannot be garnished for payday loan debt under Texas law
Your home (if declared homestead) is protected from debt collection
Always verify your lender is licensed at occc.texas.gov before borrowing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC)

warningBox.title: Important Cost Warning
warningBox.content: Payday loans in Texas are among the most expensive in the nation. A typical $300 loan can cost over $1,000 in fees alone, resulting in APRs exceeding 700%. Consider alternatives such as credit union loans, payment plans with creditors, or nonprofit credit counseling before taking out a payday loan.

stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal advice. Payday loan laws and regulations change frequently. The information presented may not reflect the most current legal developments. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, contact the Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner at (800) 538-1579 or visit occc.texas.gov. If you need legal advice, please consult with a licensed attorney in Texas.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Irving location? We also serve these nearby communities:

faq.question: Where is your Irving location?
faq.answer: Our Irving branch is located at 3401 North MacArthur Boulevard, Suite 200, in the Las Colinas area near Toyota Music Factory. Take TX-183 Exit 10 (Las Colinas Blvd) and head south. We're easily accessible from DFW Airport.

faq.question: What are your hours in Irving?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 7 PM, and Saturday from 10 AM to 4 PM. We're closed on Sundays. You can also apply online 24/7.

faq.question: Do you serve DFW Airport employees?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We're conveniently located near DFW Airport and serve many airport workers. Our hours accommodate various shift schedules, and you can also apply online before or after work.

faq.question: How quickly can I get cash in Irving?
faq.answer: If you apply in-store during business hours and are approved, you can receive cash the same day. For online applications approved by 6 PM CT, funds are typically deposited the next business day.

faq.question: What documents do I need to bring?
faq.answer: Please bring a valid government-issued photo ID, proof of income (recent pay stub or bank statement), proof of residence (utility bill or lease), and your bank account information for direct deposit.

faq.question: Does Irving have any local payday loan ordinances?
faq.answer: No, Irving does not currently have local ordinances restricting payday loans beyond state regulations. However, we encourage responsible borrowing and will help you understand all terms before you commit.
